texts.CartMessage1: Işık Üniversitesi Kuluçka Merkezi, fikirlerinizi hayata geçirmenize yardımcı olmayı çok ister! Alanında uzman, son derece yetenekli danışmanlardan oluşan ekibimizle sıfırdan bir iş yaratmak hiç bu kadar kolay olmamıştı!
texts.CartMessage2: Devam eden birçok farklı projemiz ile piyasada farklı fikirleri sizlerle birlikte görme imkanına sahibiz. Mentorlarımız ve yatırımcılarımızdan oluşan inanılmaz ekibimizle birçok farklı alana ulaşabilme imkanı elde ediyoruz.
texts.CartMessage3: Işık Üniversitesi Kuluçka Merkezi yanınızda! Merkezimizde tüm kullanıcılarımız için iki dil seçeneği bulunmaktadır! Sizin için Türkçe ve İngilizce dil desteğimiz var! Merkezimizi tercih ettiğiniz dilde görüntüleyebilirsiniz!
texts.CartMessage4: Sistemimiz sadece sizin için tasarlandı! Kullanıcı dostu arayüzümüzle projeler oluşturmak, projeler ve mentorlar arasında gezinmek çocuk oyuncağı! Hadi, şimdi bize katılın ve bu yaratıcı çalışma alanını keşfetmeye başlayın!

texts.RejectionMail: Kayıt başvurunuzun yönetim kararı ile reddedildiğini üzülerek bildiririz. İyi günler dileriz.
texts.ProjectApprovedMail: Projenizin onaylandığını size bildirmek isteriz! TEBRİKLER! İyi günler dileriz.
texts.ProjectRejectedMail: Projenizin reddedildiğini size üzülerek bildiriyoruz. Bilgi eksikliği, projenin gerekliliği, proje alanı veya proje bilgilerinin eksik olması olası nedenler olabilir. Ayrıntılı bilgi için lütfen bir yönetici ile iletişime geçin. İyi günler dileriz.
texts.ProjectMentorAssgnMail: Projenize danışman atandığını bildirmekten mutluluk duyuyoruz! Lütfen sistemden projenizi kotrol ediniz.
texts.ProjectInvestorAssgn: Projenize yatırımcı atandığını bildirmekten mutluluk duyuyoruz! Lütfen sistemden projenizi kotrol ediniz.
texts.Q1: How do I become a member / How do I create an account?
texts.A1: On the main page of our website, click on join us button, and fill in the fields with your information. Make sure you choose the appropriate account type for you
texts.Q14: What account type should I choose? / What are the different user roles on this website?
texts.A14: If you have an idea for a start-up/Project, and you need help during the whole process then Entrepreneur account is for you. If you have Skills and are willing to aid and help others with their projects to gain experience working with other or want to join your already existing team, then sign up as a Collaborator. If you are looking for new investment opportunities, or just want to finance a promising project, then Investor Account is the one for you. If you are a knowledgeable or an expert on a subject and want to be able to guide and help Entrepreneurs throughout the development of their project, then Mentor is the right account type for you.
texts.Q3: What is an application? / What is the application process?
texts.A3: An application is how an account is created, the user applies for the correct account type and then the system managers can approve or decline the application depending on the info given by the user during the application process.
texts.Q4: How many Projects can I have as an entrepreneur?
texts.A4: An entrepreneur can have only one ongoing project at a time, after finishing the ongoing project the entrepreneur may start a new one with the same process for the first one.
texts.Q5: How do Attend an event? Or create an event?
texts.A5: Events are visible on Event tab and can be accessed by alL users and see their details, only Investors and Mentors can create Events.
texts.Q6: What is a request and how do I use one?
texts.A6: A request is very important part of the system, and it is how the users communicate and send their intention for something to be done or give feedback on how a task was done. A request can be sent from dashboard page.
texts.Q7: What are the steps between opening and ending a project?
texts.A7: A project starts by sending an application to the system managers, after approval it can start, and become an ongoing project. For any reason or the other a project might get suspended or cancelled by the system managers as well. If all goes well and according to the rules. The project can finish all of its milestones and be able to be finished.
texts.Q8: How do I get Investors for my project?
texts.A8: Depending on the project type, an investor can buy a share or more of the project, given that the project is investment ready (fulfilled all the requirements specified by the system managers), and is open for investment (the entrepreneur is willing to sell shares of the project to investors). Investors will have to fulfil their financial obligations after the project they invested in is finished.
texts.Q9: How many Investors Can one project have?
texts.A9: As many as the entrepreneur wants, given that the total shares sold are not exceeding 100%.
texts.Q10: How many Collaborators can work on one project?
texts.A10: AS many as the entrepreneur accepts into their project.
texts.Q11: How many Advisors can one project have?
texts.A11: Minimum 1 but depending on the needs of the entrepreneur and the project, it might have more.
texts.Q12: I have an idea for a project, and I already have a team, what is the process for us?
texts.A12: One person can register as an entrepreneur, the rest can register as collaborators, and then join the project after it has been approved.
texts.Q13: How Do I use the system UI? Where is everything?
texts.A13: Dashboard has everything you need to check from events to request, Profile has personal information. Everything else can be accessed from the side bar.
texts.Q2: I want to join a project as a collaborator, what should I do?
texts.A2: Send a request to join the project you are interested in, the wait for the entrepreneur to approve or reject your request.
texts.Q15: How do I submit the requested documents?
texts.A15: The system managers will specify documents to be sent depending on the situation, to comply you will have to send the specified documents to the email address they requested using your own email address.
